virtual GISGEOM_API GisILineStringSegment* GisAgfGeometryFactory::CreateLineStringSegment (  GisInt32  dimtype,
GisInt32  numOrdinates,
double *  ordinates
)  [virtual]
 

Creates a LineStringSegment object by copying from an array of ordinates.

Parameters:
dimtype Input dimensionality of the ordinates (see GisDimensionality)
numOrdinates Input total number of ordinates in the array
ordinates Input ordinate array representing positions
Returns:
Returns a LineStringSegment

Implements GisGeometryFactoryAbstract.
